start_dialogue: ^Okay all setup. Lets start before it gets too late
^Alright, Ah Mui, make it perfect. Ah Boon is going to taste the love in every bite
^Where’s… where’s the cardamom? Aiyoh! I forgot it!
^He’s going to notice. Curry won’t taste the same without it
^It’s alright, Ah Mui… just keep going. Maybe he won’t notice. Maybe… maybe it’ll still be good
